channel.title: School SYSTEM!-How To Hack!
channel.description:
Ok... First of the system requirements :D
[ul][li]Windows XP[/li] [li]School Network[/li] [li]Eyes[/li] [li]A Mouse[/li] [li]A Keyboard[/li] [li]Internet Exploror[/li] [li]A ComputerScreen[/li] [li]NO MOUTH (This is incase you tell your freinds and they leech it A massive NO NO!)[/li] [li]Freinds to laugh at when you hack them :D :D :D[/li][/ul]
Okay Are we Ready gimmy a Big !@!LeTs HaCk My CoMpUtEr SyStEm!@!
[b]Step One :-[/b] Open up notepad, then open you your browser and look in the "[i]Faviourts[/i]" Tab...Find one you like :D(if there isnt one obvusly create one) then drag it into notepad.
[b]Step Two :-[/b] Now it will compe up somthing like this (if not you did somthing wrong) [code][DEFAULT] BASEURL=http://www.somethinghere.com/index.php [InternetShortcut] URL=http://www.somethinghere.com/index.php Modified=204A36819819C60199 [/code]
[b]Step Three :-[/b] now go to MyComputer (if not availible) go to My Documents then press the adress bar down button,,,, and it should have alot of file there..... and there also should be one one with alot of codes..... now drag that on the [code]URL=http://www.somethinghere.com/index.php[/code] Take away the [code]http://www.somethinghere.com/index.php[/code] wipe that all away! exept for the [i]URL=[/i] now as i said before drag that one with all the nomubers and letters on to your notepad.... now put it after the[code]URL=[/code]
[b]Step Four :-[/b] Click File -> Save [b](NOT SAVE AS)[/b] Then close your notepad window..... Now go back to your browser and go to faviourts and click the one that you edited in notepad
[b]Step Five :-[/b] GO THE HECK WILD AND DONT SAY U GOT IT FROM ME
While in this system you can: Shut Down Diffrent Computers Change Everyones Password Change Everyones Username Change Your Printing Balance (if you have one) And Possibly Doing this will F*** up your system [b] Also MUST READ! [/b] DONT LET YOUR TEACHER FIND OUT!!! AND DONT BLAME ME!!!
i do this @ school all the time and i got suspended so watch out :| :|

item.title: School SYSTEM!-How To Hack!
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:56, topic:32495”]I was caught by my Computer Apps teacher stealing peoples work saved to their personal drives, and my Flash Drives were confiscated, apparently I was using them to Bypass restricted programs, websites, etc, etc. I also had a 8gb Flash Drive with about 48 or so Cracked and patched programs. So I got suspended for 5 months, sent to a Juvenile Penitentiary for 2 months of the 5 months, and House arrest with no access to any Computing device. I failed 2 classes, and had to pay for all of the programs because of what happened.

Thank God I was caught on school property with Warez, otherwise I’d be in a shitload of more trouble.[/quote]

holy fucking shit

runs dban on his computer

Read full topic

item.title: School SYSTEM!-How To Hack!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I was caught by my Computer Apps teacher stealing peoples work saved to their personal drives, and my Flash Drives were confiscated, apparently I was using them to Bypass restricted programs, websites, etc, etc. I also had a 8gb Flash Drive with about 48 or so Cracked and patched programs. So I got suspended for 5 months, sent to a Juvenile Penitentiary for 2 months of the 5 months, and House arrest with no access to any Computing device. I failed 2 classes, and had to pay for all of the programs because of what happened.

Thank God I was caught on school property with Warez, otherwise I’d be in a shitload of more trouble.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

wazup:

ma skool dnt let u open .bat stupid fukers . i dnt get step 3 on dis tho codes.

[offtopic]Yeah People make a lot of viruses in .bat, I was thinking of putting A virus that shuts down your computer as soon as you turn it on, on a floppy disc and activating it at school, but I didnt have the guts to do it. [/offtopic]

Well, I did this At the library, (Theres a computer all the way in the back [in the non fiction section what a surprise, no one goes there]) AND I GOT CAUGHT AND WENT TO JAIL jk lol. I shut down some computers And I could hear someone try to supress their noise level. “NOOOooOOOOOoooOOoO”

Lmao. This is Nice.
